title.narrative: Improving marketing and staff skills leading to more clients

description.narrative: Go Noi SACCO (GCF) is currently only operating in Dien Quang Dien Trung and Dien Phong. It started in 2009 with 32 members and has grown to more than 1000 since. GCF operates under the cooperative law and under the saving credit fund regulation issued by State Bank. GCF started with an equity of 1 billion VND (40.000€) and this has increased to 30 billion VND (1.200.000€). 27 billion VND is mobilized from the members via savings 20 billion is used for loans to the members and there is a reserve of 20 billion VND. The membership was VND 100.000 but increased recently to VND 300.000. Only members can get a loan from the SACCO. GCF has 500 loan clients. Besides loans the sacco also collects savings from their members. GCF it has the ambition to expand to 3 more communes and want to develop financial products that serve their members best in their need for liquidity. Furthermore GCF has the ambition to reach 3000 members in 5 years and mobilize 100 billion VND capital of which 65 billion is used for its loan portfolio. On the basis of a successful company assessment an action plan for 2016 has been developed.
Reach 3000 members in 5 years and mobilize 100 billion VND capital of which 65 billion is used for its loan portfolio Increase the market share in three communes from 17.6% in 2017 to 31.2% by 2021

The following three activities for 2016 have been drawn up:• Develop a communication plan• Convert operational data into management information• Recruitment at least one new qualified employee in 2016 In addition to these three activities there must be an ongoing focus on recruiting new members and getting new deposits in 2016 and 2017. Furthermore it is advised to: develop a new strategic plan at the beginning of 2017 including:• the mission vision and a thorough SWOT analysis • take reasoned strategic steps for the planning period and • specific and SMART activities as an outcome
First payment 98% of the budget balance project 2017
First payment 98% of the budget balance project 2017
Last payment 2% of the budget based on real costs and after the narrative and financial reports hav
